org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.escape

Class SimpleEscape

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.driver.CompilerPhase
      • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.escape.SimpleEscape

  • class SimpleEscape
extends CompilerPhase
    Simple flow-insensitive intra-procedural escape analysis. Information about other procedures is only used when examining call instructions.

    NOTE: The analysis is tailored to the optimizations that currently make use of it and NOT suited for general tasks that rely on escape analysis. In particular, the analysis may incorrectly classify uses as thread-local or method-local. This does not cause problems for the implemented optimizations because those will only be performed when the definition of the object in question is contained in the method that's being compiled.

    TODO list:

    • This would be more effective if formulated as a data-flow problem, and solved with iteration.
    • Implement a more powerful analysis that it suitable for general use and add suitable references
    • Write a testsuite that demonstrates the capabilities of the analysis

        public final boolean shouldPerform(OptOptions options)
        Description copied from class: CompilerPhase

      • simpleEscapeAnalysis

        public FI_EscapeSummary simpleEscapeAnalysis(IR ir)
        Performs the escape analysis for a method.

        Side effect: updates method summary database to hold escape analysis result for parameters

        Parameters:
        ir - IR for the target method
        Returns:
        an object holding the result of the analysis

      • checkAllAppearances

        private static SimpleEscape.AnalysisResult checkAllAppearances(Register reg,
                                                               IR ir)
        Checks all appearances of a register, to see if any instruction in this method causes the object pointed to by the register to escape this thread and/or method.
        Parameters:
        reg - the register to check
        ir - the governing IR
        Returns:
        true if it may escape this thread, false otherwise

      • getParameterIndex

        private static int getParameterIndex(Operand op,
                                     Instruction s)
        Which parameter to a call instruction corresponds to op?

        PRECONDITION: Call.conforms(s)

        Parameters:
        op - the operand whose parameter is sought
        s - the call instruction
        Returns:
        the index in the instruction for the parameter that matches the operand

      • getMethodSummaryIfAvailable

        private static MethodSummary getMethodSummaryIfAvailable(RVMMethod m,
                                                         OptOptions options)
        Returns a method summary if present.

        In the special case of enabled eager method summary computation, this method will perform escape analysis for the requested method, which will create the method summary as a side effect.

        Parameters:
        m - the method whose summary is sought
        options - options to determine whether to create a summary if it does not exist
        Returns:
        a method summary or null.
